New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112* for India, breaking multiple records in the match; India won by 91 runs, a significant margin; Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match and Player of the Series
Key Match Events: India's strong batting performance led to a comfortable victory; Key wickets fell at crucial moments, including Shubman Gill and Hardik Pandya; Sri Lanka's batting struggled to contain India's chase
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav and other players expressed pride in the team's performance; The series win was highlighted as a pivotal moment for India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot; Umpires and referees were named, but no significant details were provided
